medical_history.chief_complaint: I don't feel like doing anything anymore.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Over the previous 6 months, Ms. A had become increasingly depressed, dependent on her daughters, and more physically frail. She reported a depressed mood, frequent crying spells, poor sleep with trouble falling asleep, frequent awakenings during the night, a low energy level, and difficulty concentrating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of depression dating back approximately 13 years, left internal capsule lacunar infarct, hypercholesterolemia, gastritis, gouty arthritis, osteoporosis.
medical_history.social_history: Youngest of four children, never had regular employment outside of the home, never learned to drive, placed in an assisted-living facility after her husband died.
